column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4937_97eea5856978340f9b683d99fc4566e3e320e2bb/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
I always wondered how I can remove a watch-only address, can you explain @cozz?\n
@Diapolo You can't. Bitcoin Core has no concept of removing anything from the wallet.\n
@wtogami We acquire the lock globally in rpcserver.cpp. We should remove them here, because otherwise they are confusing people...\n
